description: This file defines the interface for the AppManager component within the WPEFramework, including notification callbacks for app lifecycle events and methods to manage applications.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for managing applications within the system, including methods for launching, closing, and querying apps, as well as setting properties and managing app focus.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Callback interface for receiving notifications about application lifecycle events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback to receive app lifecycle event notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over all launchable applications.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves an iterator over all currently loaded applications.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an application given its app ID, intent, and launch arguments.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an application into memory with its intent and launch arguments.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an application for launch, possibly by preloading resources.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified application.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes a specified application.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates a specified application.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears data associated with a specified application.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specified application.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for a specified application using a key.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Retrieves a specific property value of a given application.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property value for a specified application.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of inactive apps allowed.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of inactive apps allowed.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of hibernated apps allowed.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum number of hibernated apps allowed.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum flash storage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum flash storage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Retrieves the maximum RAM usage allowed for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
